name: Drive Mania
description:
Drive Mania is an easy to play, physics based racing game. Control your car to climb hills with most realistic control to face the challenges of unique uphill & downhill environments. Get bonus scores for Rubies. And watch out for your head. If you touch it, your ride will be abruptly over! Race against the clock in this exciting and challenging game.
Features:
- 2 vehicle with upgrades ("Cowboy, Lady").
- 2 Stages (Forest, Alentejo, Desert). 
- 2 Bonus stages (Autumn, Helloween).
- 51 Levels
Come to join this this cool climb racing game now!
